xwikidoc.name: JobAreaSheet

xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('JobArea.JobAreaClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'JobArea.JobAreaTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_position">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('position', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('position') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_introduction">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('introduction', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('introduction') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_companyDescription">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('companyDescription', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('companyDescription') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_responsibilities">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('responsibilities', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('responsibilities') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_requiredCompetences">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('requiredCompetences', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('requiredCompetences') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_otherSkills">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('otherSkills', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('otherSkills') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_benefits">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('benefits', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('benefits') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_otherDetails">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('otherDetails', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('otherDetails') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_status">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('status', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('status') ; <label for="JobArea.JobAreaClass_0_validation">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('validation', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('validation') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
